title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 400.8 - Advertising
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 400.8 - Advertising

State Regulations

If a licensee states or indicates in advertising of any
kind or nature, or by a sign of any kind, that it is licensed by or subject to
the supervision of the superintendent it may do so only by use of the following
phrase: "Licensed by the Superintendent of Banks pursuant to
article 9-A of the Banking Law."
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
400.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
